Title: Allows the city of New York to convey certain lands to the Amity Little League, Inc.
Summary: Allows the city of New York to convey the Amity Little League Baseball Complex to the Amity Little League, Inc. for a period of forty years; subjects the conveyance to the provisions of the Uniform Land Use Review Procedure.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the city of New York to transfer and convey certain state land to the Amity Little League, Inc.; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
